name: fnerel

stmt.origin: relopabi(hs0, hs1, cfne, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wss(cv(hs2), cuni(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(hs2))))))))
stmt.pretty: relopabi(hs0, hs1, cfne, (⋃ hs0 = ⋃ hs1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0, hs2 ⊆ ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(hs2)))))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cfne)
-| wceq(cfne, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wss(cv(hs2), cuni(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(hs2)))))))))
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(Fne)
⊣ Fne = { < hs0, hs1 > |(⋃ hs0 = ⋃ hs1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0, hs2 ⊆ ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(hs2))))}

-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
body.pretty:
⊢ Fne = { < hs0, hs1 > |(⋃ hs0 = ⋃ hs1 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0, hs2 ⊆ ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(hs2))))}
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, hs2)
⊣ d(hs1, hs2)

|- wrel(cfne)
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)

cumulated.pretty:

comment: Fineness is a relation. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Sep-2009.)
